d_title:
We provide delivery
by road and rail
d_text: We will deliver the goods anywhere in Russia and the CIS countries. Logistics proven over the years allows us to optimize costs.
p_text: You can pay for the goods in any way convenient for you:
p_list_1: Cashless payment with legal entities. persons
p_list_3: We open special accounts in banks
p_list_5: Deferred payments and discounts for regular customers
p_list_6: Special conditions for construction and manufacturing companies
